purpleculture_pinyin:
qiáo
to look at; to see; to see (a doctor); to visit
смотреть на; чтобы увидеть; видеть (к врачу); посетить
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 焦 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
瞧见 [ qiáo jiàn ]: to see
走着瞧 [ zǒu zhe qiáo ]: wait and see (who is right)
小瞧 [ xiǎo qiáo ]: (coll.) to look down on; to underestimate
瞧不起 [ qiáo bù qǐ ]: to look down upon; to hold in contempt
等着瞧 [ děng zhe qiáo ]: wait and see (who is right)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 焦 [ jiāo ] burned, scorched; anxious, vexed
heisig_chinese_memo: When you first lay eyes on your true love you feel apprehensive because you want them to like you. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese: qiáo: (глаг) (разг.) смотреть на; посещать (кого-л.)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When you first lay eyes on your true love you feel apprehensive because you want them to like you. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From " eye " to " focus " sound. " Look " means looking dizzy. For example, Wei Jikang of the Three Kingdoms "Naturally Difficult to Learn": "If you look at it, you can look at it by looking at it. If you repair it, you can change it. If you follow suit, you can change your muscles. Tan Lidian can cause dental caries."

" Look " means peeking. Such as Feng Menglong in the Ming Dynasty "Jing Shi Tong Yan. Jiang Shuzhen Neck-Necked Mandarin Duck Club": "He is both greedy and greedy, and don't watch out for people outside the door!" Chapter 28 of "Journey to the West": "The old demon, he also took a peek. I saw Sanzang's head straight up and his appearance. Sure enough, what a monk."

" Look " also generally refers to watching. Such as Kong Shangren in the Qing Dynasty "Peach Blossom Fan. "Throwing Rulls": "The qi is gone, there is a letter from the general to take a closer look." Liu E's "Lao Can's Travels" Chapter 1: "Look, there is a sailboat over there in the huge waves, it is dangerous!"
humanum_short_description_en: From the " eye " to the " focus " sound. " Look " means looking dizzy, but also means peeking.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「焦」聲。「瞧」表示眼目昏蒙之貌。如三國魏嵇康〈難自然好學論〉：「覩文籍則目瞧，脩揖讓則變傴，襲章服則轉筋，譚禮典則齒齲。」

　　「瞧」表示偷看。如明代馮夢龍《警世通言．蔣淑真刎頸鴛鴦會》：「他兩個貪歡貪笑，不提防門外有人瞧！」《西遊記》第28回：「那老妖，他也偷眼瞧一瞧。只見三藏頭直上，貌堂堂，果然好一個和尚。」

　　「瞧」也泛指看。如清代孔尚任《桃花扇．投轅》：「氣也麼消，有書函將軍仔細瞧。」劉鶚《老殘遊記》第1回：「你瞧，那邊一隻帆船在那洪波巨浪之中，好不危險！」
humanum_short_description: 從「目」，「焦」聲。「瞧」表示眼目昏蒙之貌，又表示偷看。

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 焦 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 5

Chinese: When you first lay eyes on your true love you feel apprehensive because you want them to like you.  
Meaning: lay eyes on
Story: When you first lay eyes on your true love you feel apprehensive because you want them to like you.  
Kind: both
從「 目 」，「 焦 」聲。「 瞧 」表示眼目昏蒙之貌。如三國魏嵇康〈難自然好學論〉：「覩文籍則目瞧，脩揖讓則變傴，襲章服則轉筋，譚禮典則齒齲。」 「 瞧 」表示偷看。如明代馮夢龍《警世通言．蔣淑真刎頸鴛鴦會》：「他兩個貪歡貪笑，不提防門外有人瞧！」《西遊記》第28回：「那老妖，他也偷眼瞧一瞧。只見三藏頭直上，貌堂堂，果然好一個和尚。」 「 瞧 」也泛指看。如清代孔尚任《桃花扇．投轅》：「氣也麼消，有書函將軍仔細瞧。」劉鶚《老殘遊記》第1回：「你瞧，那邊一隻帆船在那洪波巨浪之中，好不危險！」
From " eye" to " focus" sound. " Look" means looking dizzy. For example, Wei Jikang of the Three Kingdoms "Naturally Difficult to Learn": "If you look at it, you can look at it by looking at it. If you repair it, you can change it. If you follow suit, you can change your muscles. Tan Lidian can cause dental caries." " Look" means peeking. Such as Feng Menglong in the Ming Dynasty "Jing Shi Tong Yan. Jiang Shuzhen Neck-Necked Mandarin Duck Club": "He is both greedy and greedy, and don't watch out for people outside the door!" Chapter 28 of "Journey to the West": "The old demon, he also took a peek. I saw Sanzang's head straight up and his appearance. Sure enough, what a monk." " Look" also generally refers to watching. Such as Kong Shangren in the Qing Dynasty "Peach Blossom Fan. "Throwing Rulls": "The qi is gone, there is a letter from the general to take a closer look." Liu E's "Lao Can's Travels" Chapter 1: "Look, there is a sailboat over there in the huge waves, it is dangerous!"

瞧字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞧； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页817第09
【字彙】慈消切，音樵。偸視貌。【嵆康·難自然好學論】覩文籍則目瞧。　又叶才笑切，樵去聲。【郭璞·鴣?黃鳥贊】鴣?之鳥，食之不瞧。爰有黃鳥，其鳴則叫。婦人是服，矯情易操。

瞧字的源字形

瞧字的起名意思

眼昏花。也指看。

qiáo
гл.
1) смотреть; бросать взгляд; рассматривать, разглядывать
瞧了他一眼 бросить на него взгляд
2) смотреть украдкой, взглядывать тайком
睹文籍则目瞧 если увидит литературное произведение, то хоть украдкой пробежит его
3) навещать, наносить визит, прийти; приходить на приём; принимать
我是来瞧朋友的 я пришёл навестить друга (ср. взглянуть на друга)
瞧客 принимать посетителей, выходить к гостям
